alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Trumbull and northeastern Mahoning Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hubbard, or near Youngstown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Leavittsburg, Austintown, Struthers, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Craig Beach, Lowellville and Yankee Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
